Sparknotes.TITLE: OVERWHELMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group is overwhelmed by the infestation in the swamps, and is forced to retreat.

Sparknotes.TITLE: OVERWHELMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale is backed into a corner and is unable to escape—which is when Padric charges to her rescue. He’s able to fight a way clear for her, but is seriously injured in the fighting.

Sparknotes.TITLE: OVERWHELMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: They carry him to safety, but he’s still much too weak to fight until he can receive real treatment.

Sparknotes.TITLE: OVERWHELMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Special: Padric is injured.

Sparknotes.TITLE: PATTERNS IN THE DIRT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: PATTERNS IN THE DIRT

Sparknotes.TITLE: PATTERNS IN THE DIRT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group takes stock after Zafir and the anointed are gone. Damocles is furious with Nightingale and seems like he might be abandoning them, but Nightingale calls him out and he apologizes reluctantly. He isn’t going to leave.

Sparknotes.TITLE: PATTERNS IN THE DIRT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: They need to find Echo, because she had the piece of the Pontifex that Zafir took. Nightingale asks the Maluma for help, and It agrees, in exchange for giving it control of her body during the search. She refuses.

Sparknotes.TITLE: PATTERNS IN THE DIRT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Remi gets her attention, shouting that Gage has found tracks from where the Soul Stitcher dragged Echo through the swamp.

Sparknotes.TITLE: PATTERNS IN THE DIRT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After gathering up their possessions, they set off after the tracks into the night.

Sparknotes.TITLE: PATTERNS IN THE DIRT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

Sparknotes.TITLE: PONTIFEX BEGONE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: PONTIFEX BEGONE

Sparknotes.TITLE: PONTIFEX BEGONE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Echo is finally defeated, badly wounded and backed into a corner. Nightingale urges her to stop, but she drags herself alone, unable to keep fighting through conditions that would’ve killed a normal person.

Sparknotes.TITLE: PONTIFEX BEGONE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Anointed prepare to finally kill here, but Zafir refuses to do anything to stop her. He wants to know why she is fighting them, and why he hasn’t returned to her before now.

Sparknotes.TITLE: PONTIFEX BEGONE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Before she can answer, the Soul Stitcher returns, a powerful esper that seals her wounds in a few moments before callously dragging her back through the jungle away from camp. She screams for help a second before she vanishes into the undergrowth.

Sparknotes.TITLE: PONTIFEX BEGONE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir tries to follow, but he’s not fast enough. The Soul Stitcher doesn’t actually care about hurting her, and so they quickly lose it in the night.

Sparknotes.TITLE: PONTIFEX BEGONE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Flag: Grievous Wounds

Sparknotes.TITLE: PRESSING THROUGH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: PRESSING THROUGH

Sparknotes.TITLE: PRESSING THROUGH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The cave is infested with monsters, and the group is quickly overwhelmed. After fighting desperately onward anyway, Nightingale eventually discovers an opening to retreat and calls for them to follow.

Sparknotes.TITLE: PRESSING THROUGH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: They do so, escaping the monsters following them. But not before Zeke is injured in the retreat, impaling himself on a sharpened jungle plant. Rook carries him to safety, but the damage is done.

Sparknotes.TITLE: PRESSING THROUGH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Special: Zeke is injured.

Sparknotes.TITLE: RELUCTANT PARTNERSHIP
Sparknotes.CONTENT: RELUCTANT PARTNERSHIP

Sparknotes.TITLE: RELUCTANT PARTNERSHIP
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale decides that the best way to proceed is with Zafir on their side, and declares her ultimatum for him. They’re on the same side, they have the same enemies, and she demands that he help her get free of the Maluma.

Sparknotes.TITLE: RELUCTANT PARTNERSHIP
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Damocles is outraged by this alliance, and does everything he can to persuade them not to stay with Zafir. He insists that Zafir can’t be trusted, and even tries to attack him. Nightingale refuses his arguments, and eventually he settles for vowing to watch Zafir and search for disloyalty.

Sparknotes.TITLE: RELUCTANT PARTNERSHIP
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir waits patiently for this display to be concluded, before introducing Nightingale to the surviving Anointed, Ezra and Brea.

Sparknotes.TITLE: RELUCTANT PARTNERSHIP
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After these introductions, Zafir confides in Nightingale, apologizing for attacking her and confessing that she is clearly still in control of herself. Even so, he says that he’ll be ready to kill her if the Maluma ever wins.

Sparknotes.TITLE: RELUCTANT PARTNERSHIP
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Party Member: Zafir

Sparknotes.TITLE: RELUCTANT PARTNERSHIP
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: Reluctant Partnership

Sparknotes.TITLE: RELUCTANT PARTNERSHIP
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Last of Her Coterie

Sparknotes.TITLE: RETREATING WURM
Sparknotes.CONTENT: RETREATING WURM

Sparknotes.TITLE: RETREATING WURM
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The fight with Alana doesn’t go as well for her as she expects, as the group manages to beat her back, weakening her Wurm and nearly killing them both. She’s forced to retreat underground to avoid being killed.

Sparknotes.TITLE: RETREATING WURM
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group tries to follow, but they’re not fast enough, and they can’t tunnel like the Wurm can. It tunnels away into the darkness, leaving them behind.

Sparknotes.TITLE: RETREATING WURM
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group returns to the surface, finding Nightingale isn’t waiting for them at the camp.

Sparknotes.TITLE: RETREATING WURM
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook insits they go right back underground to find her, but no one else has enough energy for the task. He’s outvoted, as everyone else says they need to rest before they can go back down. They’re all wounded and exhausted from the fight, and getting themselves killed won’t help Nightingale.

Sparknotes.TITLE: RETREATING WURM
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Key Defeat

Sparknotes.TITLE: RETURN OF THE GATEKEEPER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: RETURN OF THE GATEKEEPER

Sparknotes.TITLE: RETURN OF THE GATEKEEPER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Before Justice can explain more of what she’s learned, the alarm goes up in the Anointed camp.

Sparknotes.TITLE: RETURN OF THE GATEKEEPER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: It’s nothing dangerous, though. Instead, the friendly gatekeeper Lakshmi returns, explaining that she has acquired more of value and they seem like they want to trade.

Sparknotes.TITLE: REVENGE FOR ECHO
Sparknotes.CONTENT: REVENGE FOR ECHO

Sparknotes.TITLE: REVENGE FOR ECHO
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale wanders through the camp, past the corpses of the fallen members of the Anointed. She can’t help but feel guilt for killing Zafir, even though he was hardly kind to her. The Maluma appears, furious with her. Charon apparently wanted him, and by killing him the Maluma will be unable to appease its master.

Sparknotes.TITLE: REVENGE FOR ECHO
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Remi and Zeke try to reassure Nightingale, without much success. She finds the well and washes her face, but still feels bloody. Justice refuses to help them find Echo, who they still need to track down to get back the piece of the Pontifex she took from Zafir.

Sparknotes.TITLE: REVENGE FOR ECHO
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale tries to find her location by asking the Maluma, but it only laughs in her face.

Sparknotes.TITLE: REVENGE FOR ECHO
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Eventually Remi notices that Echo has left some tracks. If they hurry, they can follow her before she gets too far.

Sparknotes.TITLE: REVENGE FOR ECHO
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Justice is no longer Unelectable.

Sparknotes.TITLE: REVENGE FOR ECHO
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

Sparknotes.TITLE: ROBED FIGURES
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ROBED FIGURES

Sparknotes.TITLE: ROBED FIGURES
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale and Breeze hurry towards Alana’s lair. Breeze shows Nightingale a key she collected from one of the gatekeepers they fought, which she hopes will be able to open the cages.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ROBED FIGURES
Sparknotes.CONTENT: They break into the lair moments later, a vast space filled with cages and corpses. Breeze runs through it, searching for the other members of her tribe, and is horrified to learn that Alana ate them first.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ROBED FIGURES
Sparknotes.CONTENT: There are other prisoners though, the Anointed, and they show Breeze a nymph they managed to hide from Alana, Ursy. As Breeze starts to open their cages, another Gatekeeper arrives to interrupt their jailbreak.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ROOK THE RESCUER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ROOK THE RESCUER

Sparknotes.TITLE: ROOK THE RESCUER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After desperate combat through the ruins of Gehenna, the group finally overcomes the worst of the monstrous infestation. Rook leads them through many dangerous traps, assuring Remi that she isn’t responsible for their difficulty.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ROOK THE RESCUER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Eventually the group discovers the path deeper into the library, and continues deeper.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ROOK, THE BEST PIECE ON THE BOARD
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ROOK, THE BEST PIECE ON THE BOARD

Sparknotes.TITLE: ROOK, THE BEST PIECE ON THE BOARD
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Though the fight was desperate, Rook and Suri are able to protect Remi through the night. Even so, Rook is seriously injured by the time the rest of the group arrives from their wandering in the archives.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ROOK, THE BEST PIECE ON THE BOARD
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice, Damocles, and Zeke are arguing over who is responsible for the disaster they encountered, and each one wants to take the blame. Even so, Justice explains that they were able to learn more about the purpose of the Pontifex, and she needs to pass that information to Nightingale right away.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ROOK, THE BEST PIECE ON THE BOARD
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Rook is injured.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SAFE RESTING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: SAFE RESTING

Sparknotes.TITLE: SAFE RESTING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zeke expresses dissatisfaction with just waiting for Remi to recover, given they’re separated and Nightingale could be in danger. He suggests going with Justice and Damocles to find information about the Pontifex, while Rook protects Remi.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SAFE RESTING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After a brief agreement, they agree, and Justice leads the way down towards the forbidden section.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SHAYLISS IS GOING TO KILL ME
Sparknotes.CONTENT: SHAYLISS IS GOING TO KILL ME

Sparknotes.TITLE: SHAYLISS IS GOING TO KILL ME
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group chats together during lunch. Damocles shows off his Iridium dagger, explaining its special properties.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SHAYLISS IS GOING TO KILL ME
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale offers Padric an out to return to his inn, but he refuses. He says he wants to stay with the group because he’s sure they’re going to survive, and he doesn’t want to get in trouble for abandoning them.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SHAYLISS IS GOING TO KILL ME
Sparknotes.CONTENT: SHAYLISS IS GOING TO KILL ME

Sparknotes.TITLE: SHAYLISS IS GOING TO KILL ME
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group chats together during lunch. Damocles shows off his Iridium dagger, explaining its special properties.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SHAYLISS IS GOING TO KILL ME
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale offers Padric an out to return to his inn, but he refuses. He says he wants to stay with the group because he’s sure they’re going to survive, and he doesn’t want to get in trouble for abandoning them.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: LAKSHMI THE GATEKEEPER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: SIDE QUEST: LAKSHMI THE GATEKEEPER

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: LAKSHMI THE GATEKEEPER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Remi approaches Rook, who has been watching Lakshmi trade with the Anointed. He explains that he’s trying to understand gatekeepers, and make sense of their motivations. Remi discourages him from pestering her, but Rook ignores her.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: LAKSHMI THE GATEKEEPER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook formally introduces himself to the merchant, and asks why she’s collecting keys. They have a long conversation about how she’s hoping to find the way to open the door to her destiny. But Lakshmi is frustrated, since she lost a key she thinks is important somewhere in the swamp.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: LAKSHMI THE GATEKEEPER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook volunteers to retrieve it for her, and gathers the others. It was only a tree that took it, after all. But Damocles, Nightingale, and Zeke know better. Even so, it’s too late to refuse, and so they set off.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: MY COLLECTION IS HUGE!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: SIDE QUEST: MY COLLECTION IS HUGE!

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: MY COLLECTION IS HUGE!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook and Remi are cooling down after the fight with a few hands of Abraxis, when one of the Anointed notices they’re playing. He introduces himself as Ezra, and thanks them for the rescue. He brings over his own deck, sharing a rare card from Brahma. He promises to grant them a much better reward if they’re able to defeat it.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: MY COLLECTION IS HUGE!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook and Remi seem confident they’ll be able to triumph easily, though ultimately the dice will decide.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: THE LONELY GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: SIDE QUEST: THE LONELY GIRL

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: THE LONELY GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Flag Requirement: Last of Her Coterie

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: THE LONELY GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale discovers Ursy alone in a dark corner of the camp, obviously traumatized after what she suffered. She does her best to comfort the nymph, but Ursy is heartbroken beyond reason. In her mind, her entire world is gone, entire tribe slaughtered.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: THE LONELY GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale learns that the Nymphs aren’t immortal, and rarely live beyond twenty years old. That’s why Alana became the monster she was in the first place, making a pact with her Wurm in order to extend her life.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: THE LONELY GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Ursy explains that though Nymphs don’t live very long, they do contain a seed inside them, which can germinate into the next generation after their death. She’s heartbroken that those Alana consumed were destroyed, but then seems relieved when she realizes that there were others in her village who hadn’t been planted yet.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SIDE QUEST: THE LONELY GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale volunteers the group to help out, and soon they set out into the jungle to recover and plant the seeds. They discover Usry’s old village, overgrown and destroyed. As Ursy begins searching for the seeds, monsters from the jungle are attracted by the noise.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SOMETHING’S COMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: SOMETHING’S COMING

Sparknotes.TITLE: SOMETHING’S COMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook stays awake through the night, keeping watching over a resting Remi. After several hours alone, Gaige alerts him to the approach of dangerous creatures from the darkness.

Sparknotes.TITLE: SOMETHING’S COMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: At first it seems that he’s going to have to fight them alone, but Suri manifests to assist him, willing to risk the Great Bounty noticing her to keep Rook safe. They will have to fight together.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE ARCHIVES
Sparknotes.CONTENT: THE ARCHIVES

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE ARCHIVES
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice leads half of the group through Gehenna until she reaches a magically sealed door. She opens it using her magic, exposing the archives within. Though the books and artifacts within are in pristine condition, the archives have been converted into a monster’s den.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE ARCHIVES
Sparknotes.CONTENT: It’s filled with rotting corpses, and there’s a huge opening in the floor used by some burrowing creature. There are also three guardians watching over the archives, Gatekeepers who emerge from the shadows and attack.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE FERRY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: THE FERRY

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE FERRY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The hike out of Gehenna takes several days, but eventually the group comes to a humble port town on the edge of a mountainous cliff.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE FERRY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss suggests this would be a good place to recuperate and restock before the difficult journey to come.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE FERRY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group is ecstatic to finally be out of the swamps and to reach civilization, even if it’s a port of thieves and privateers.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE STITCHER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: THE STITCHER

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE STITCHER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Together the group enters the cave, knowing that Echo must be inside. They wander for a little while, until they hear Echo’s voice leading them onward. They suspect a trap, but Echo doesn’t harm them, and they find her sitting alone in a lonely cavern.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE STITCHER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Echo wants to know what happened to Zafir, but Nightingale refuses to say. She demands the Pontifex piece, which Echo refuses. She doesn’t want to hurt Echo for it, because of the promise she made Zafir. But she can’t leave without it.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE STITCHER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After a brief argument, the Soul Stitcher arrives, and forced Echo to attack.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE TRAIL TO ECHO
Sparknotes.CONTENT: THE TRAIL TO ECHO

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE TRAIL TO ECHO
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook and Damocles lead the group along the trail, using their ample tracking experience to ensure that they don’t get lost.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THE TRAIL TO ECHO
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After hiking all day, they eventually follow it to a cave. After preparing for a bit, they enter together, knowing Echo must be inside.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THERE’S NO JUSTICE ANYMORE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: THERE’S NO JUSTICE ANYMORE

Sparknotes.TITLE: THERE’S NO JUSTICE ANYMORE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Though they fight bravely, Echo defeats the group. She insists this is why Zafir was the world’s only hope, that without him even Charon’s pawns can’t be defeated. She decides who to kill first, eventually settling on Justice.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THERE’S NO JUSTICE ANYMORE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice tries to resist, even futilely stabbing Echo, but the Soul Stitcher just heals the wound. Echo conjures a strange portal through her Esper, opening into a dark place with a powerful evil waiting on the other side. Everyone has been so badly beaten they can only watch as she banishes Justice through it.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THERE’S NO JUSTICE ANYMORE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Echo seems like she’s going to kill Damocles next, but the Maluma manifests physically in front of everyone, furious at Echo. She failed to notice Justice steal the pontifex piece from around her neck while she was attacking her.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THERE’S NO JUSTICE ANYMORE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A stranger appears from the shadows, attacking Echo with terrible weapons. It’s Shayliss Arsen, Nightingale’s older sister, fighting with unparalleled skill.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THERE’S NO JUSTICE ANYMORE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: But Echo doesn’t stay to fight. Before Shayliss can close the distance, the Soul Stitcher drags her away through a narrow opening in the cavern, too small to follow.

Sparknotes.TITLE: THERE’S NO JUSTICE ANYMORE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

Sparknotes.TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
Sparknotes.CONTENT: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END

Sparknotes.TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Even out in the open, Alana and her wurm are just too powerful to defeat. Everyone is beaten back one by one. Alana dismounts her wurm, and advances on Nightingale, choosing her as the first to kill. But before she can reach her, she turns and screams in horror.

Sparknotes.TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Breeze uses an incredible surge of nature magic to strike the monster, tearing it in half. She’s defenseless by the time Alana reaches her, and she’s dispatched easily, falling bleeding to the floor.

Sparknotes.TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Ursy is there moments later, with her own magic. She stabs Alana from behind. But too late. Breeze has time for a final goodbye, then falls dead.

Sparknotes.TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale does her best to comfort the devastated Ursy, crying with her in the ruins.

Sparknotes.TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Flag: Fallen Friend

Sparknotes.TITLE: TOGETHER UNTIL THE END
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Flag: Last of her Coterie

Sparknotes.TITLE: TRAPPED IN THE DARK
Sparknotes.CONTENT: TRAPPED IN THE DARK

Sparknotes.TITLE: TRAPPED IN THE DARK
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After wandering until no one in the group has the energy to keep going, they make a desperate camp in an empty chamber so they can rest and treat the injured.

Sparknotes.TITLE: TRAPPED IN THE DARK
Sparknotes.CONTENT: While the others recover, Rook focuses on treating Remi’s wounds as best he can. He sets her broken wing and cleans everything out to prevent an infection.

Sparknotes.TITLE: TRAPPED IN THE DARK
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice converses with Rook while he works, discussing the history of Gehenna with Suri. Her kind built the city, and she reveals another name for the Pontifex they’ve been hunting. This allows Justice to find it in her tome, and it gives her a map to the forbidden section of the library. They’re determined to go there as soon as Remi has more time to recover.

Sparknotes.TITLE: TRAPPED IN THE DARK
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

Sparknotes.TITLE: TRAVELING TO GEHENNA
Sparknotes.CONTENT: TRAVELING TO GEHENNA

Sparknotes.TITLE: TRAVELING TO GEHENNA
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group makes camp on a hill rising above the swamps to rest and recuperate from their difficult trek.

Sparknotes.TITLE: TRAVELING TO GEHENNA
Sparknotes.CONTENT: While cooking with Justice, Zeke learns more about her tome: Justice believes it is alive, and that its text is always changing. The book rewrites itself to display information it thinks she needs. She has learned that the Maluma is a species of Esper from Arkalla, not the name of a single individual.

Sparknotes.TITLE: TRAVELING TO GEHENNA
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zeke learns that Justice was a weeaboo, and she’s become extremely worried about Zafir’s obsession with acquiring the Pontifex. Even so, she insists that he’ll be willing to help them.

Sparknotes.TITLE: TRAVELING TO GEHENNA
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice reveals that Zafir’s organization is called the Annoyed, and she’s been going a little crazy working with them, since they’re so much older than she is.

Sparknotes.TITLE: TRAVELING TO GEHENNA
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNDER PRESSURE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: UNDER PRESSURE

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNDER PRESSURE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: During the trip out of the swamps, Zafir pulls Nightingale aside. He explains how close he was with Echo, that she was the only person he ever loved. He explains that he will held Nightingale responsible for her death forever.

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNDER PRESSURE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale tries to explain herself, but Zafir doesn’t care. He insists that the instant she shows any sign of letting the Maluma take control, he’ll enjoy killing her, no matter what it costs him.

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNDER PRESSURE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Her friends reassure Nightingale that Echo’s death wasn’t her fault, but she doesn’t believe them.

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNEXPECTED SAVIOR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: UNEXPECTED SAVIOR

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNEXPECTED SAVIOR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Despite their best efforts, they’re unable to stop Echo.

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNEXPECTED SAVIOR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: She doesn’t want to hurt Zafir, but the Soul Stitcher forces to hurt something. She decides who to kill first, eventually settling on Justice.

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNEXPECTED SAVIOR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice tries to resist, even futilely stabbing Echo, but the Soul Stitcher just heals the wound. Echo conjures a strange portal through her Esper, opening into a dark place with a powerful evil waiting on the other side. Everyone has been so badly beaten they can only watch as she banishes Justice through it.

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNEXPECTED SAVIOR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Maluma manifests physically in front of everyone, furious at Echo. She failed to notice Justice steal the pontifex piece from around her neck while she was attacking her. This draw’s Echo’s attention to Nightingale and the Maluma, and she advances, preparing to kill them next.

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNEXPECTED SAVIOR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Maluma tries to persuade her that they’re on the same side, but fails. Echo attacks, and the Maluma reacts with terrible power, manifesting as a gigantic devouring maw. It tears Echo apart in seconds, leaving her shredded to pieces. Nightingale tries and fails to stop it before Echo is killed.

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNEXPECTED SAVIOR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Reward: The Feasting

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNEXPECTED SAVIOR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: Massacred

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNEXPECTED SAVIOR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: Slipping

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNPLANNED AMBUSH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: UNPLANNED AMBUSH

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNPLANNED AMBUSH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale leads the way back into Gehenna, listening carefully for what’s going on. After not seeing the guards she expects, Nightingale scales a building to look over at what’s going on. She discovers Echo has returned and is battling against the Anointed, without seeing any sign of Zeke or Justice.

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNPLANNED AMBUSH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group makes their way in as quickly as they can. Echo seems to be winning easily, particularly since Zafir is unwilling to fight her. Instead he watches by the sidelines as Echo easily cuts through members of his organization.

Sparknotes.TITLE: UNPLANNED AMBUSH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Remi urges them to come to the help of the Anointed and worry about dealing with them afterward. The group agrees, and they join the battle.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WE CAN SAVE HER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: WE CAN SAVE HER

Sparknotes.TITLE: WE CAN SAVE HER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: In the aftermath of the battle, Remi helps free Zeke from where he’s been tied, and does her best to help him deal with the wounds. It’s not that serious, thankfully the Annointed were only trying to stop him from resisting.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WE CAN SAVE HER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice is furious with Zafir for failing to stop Echo, and for trying to kill Nightingale. The Annointed should’ve had tons of help when Echo attacked and won easily, but instead all but two of its members were killed thanks to his actions.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WE CAN SAVE HER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir is unapologetic, agreeing with her conclusions but insisting that he knows what’s best. Charon is such a powerful enemy that any sacrifice is worth paying, even many lives.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WE CAN SAVE HER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale finally gets involved, reminding him that the ones he tried to murder are Elenia’s royalty. Balthazar would probably want him dead for no other reason.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WE CAN SAVE HER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir agrees that all the charges are accurate. But he argues that him and the Anointed are the few keeping Elenia safe from Charon and the rest of his council. If he dies, then there won’t be anyone else fighting them, and all Elenia will eventually fall.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WE CAN SAVE HER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Damocles wants him dead, primarily for allowing his mother’s killer to escape. The Maluma hates Zafir, but argues that Nightingale should let him go instead.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WE CAN SAVE HER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale and Zeke must decide how to judge Zafir while they have the upper hand.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WE CAN SAVE HER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Justice is selectable again.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WE CAN SAVE HER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Zeke is selectable again.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WE CAN SAVE HER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Decision: Recruit Zafir, kill him, or release him.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU GUYS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU GUYS?

Sparknotes.TITLE: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU GUYS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook was able to hold off all the attackers that came at them in the dark, and eventually returned to resting as best he could while keeping guard.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU GUYS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Eventually the rest of the group arrives, arguing about the difficulties they had finding the tome.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU GUYS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook asks what happened, and they explain what happened in the archives. Remi is feeling much better now, and she’s ready to move.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WHAT YOU CAN’T HAVE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: WHAT YOU CAN’T HAVE

Sparknotes.TITLE: WHAT YOU CAN’T HAVE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Padric and Suri keep watch over the others while they rest. Suri is curious about what motivates Padric to work so hard for these strangers, since he lacks the strong connections the others have.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WHAT YOU CAN’T HAVE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Padric explains that he’s there because of love. Nor for any of them, but for another that he used to adventure with. He warns her of the pain caused by loving someone that he can’t have, that it can consume anyone who can’t learn to live with it.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WHAT YOU CAN’T HAVE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Suri is defensive about his accusations, insisting unconvincingly that her interest in Rook is purely academic.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WINDING DOWN
Sparknotes.CONTENT: WINDING DOWN

Sparknotes.TITLE: WINDING DOWN
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice, Zeke, and Damocles have defeated the Gatekeepers protecting the archives. Zeke urges them to return to the rest of the group.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WINDING DOWN
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice refuses, insisting that they’ve made it to their destination and now they’re free to take what they came for. Before they can force her, she darts off to claim their spoils.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WURM EN ROUTE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: WURM EN ROUTE

Sparknotes.TITLE: WURM EN ROUTE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale and the Anointed escape from the ruins of the library, and reunite with the rest of the group on the surface. They immediately try to flee Gehenna, but they don’t make it very far before Alana and her Wurm emerge from underground to block the way.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WURM EN ROUTE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Alana is enraged about the pillaging of her food, and swears she’s going to devour all of them now.

Sparknotes.TITLE: WURM EN ROUTE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Party is reunited.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BROTHER’S ADVICE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A BROTHER’S ADVICE

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BROTHER’S ADVICE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: At first Shayliss is filled with joy as her vision opens during a wedding. There is the woman she loves, waiting.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BROTHER’S ADVICE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: But it isn’t her wedding, it’s Tyrial and Abigail’s. She realizises then she’s being manipulated, and she flees from the vision, running out onto the balcony.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BROTHER’S ADVICE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Her dead older brother Dominic is waiting for her. She tries to persuade him not to go on the trip that gets him killed, but realizes swiftly that she can’t do anything to change the past.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BROTHER’S ADVICE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The coffin is honest with her, revealing that it’s feeding on her mind and soul. It insists that the way people die on trips with Balthazar isn’t a coincidence.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BROTHER’S ADVICE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Coffin Buddy

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BUMP IN THE NIGHT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A BUMP IN THE NIGHT

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BUMP IN THE NIGHT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Gage wakes Remi before sunrise. She dismisses his worries at first, but he’s too insistent for her to go back to sleep, and he leads her out of the bedroom.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BUMP IN THE NIGHT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: She discovers the Anointed sneaking out of the palace. After following them for long enough to be sure of their intentions, she hurries back to wake everyone.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BUMP IN THE NIGHT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group mobilizes as quickly as they can, with everyone certain of where the Anointed will be going.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BUMP IN THE NIGHT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Zafir is Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: A BUMP IN THE NIGHT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DARK VISIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A DARK VISIT

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DARK VISIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale leads the way, the first to fight whatever they encounter. She’s not afraid anymore, the Maluma floats around beside her every moment. Compared to the parasite strangling her soul, how can any monster frighten her?

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DARK VISIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Shadow Lord appears after a little while, expressing surprise they’re still alive. It mentions casually that the ‘others’ down in the depths are trying to get killed just as hard.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DARK VISIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale says that she doesn’t care if they get killed, they deserve it for breaking the Aegis stone. Even so, she asks where they are.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DARK VISIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Shadow Lord finally takes notice of the Maluma, remarking that it’s going to win two souls from her.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DARK VISIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale asks more respectfully, and this time the Shadow Lord answers. It appreciates the work of a serial killer, considering her a fellow craftsman.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DARK VISIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group is left to decide whether or not to follow the Shadow Lord’s instructions and find Zafir, or leave him to die.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DARK VISIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Decide to obey the Shadow Lord, or not abandon the blood trails.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DEEP WOUND
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A DEEP WOUND

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DEEP WOUND
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Soul Butchers are far too powerful, and they’re forced to flee.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DEEP WOUND
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss manages to get a side door open, but not before someone is badly wounded. They stumble out, barring the door behind them.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A DEEP WOUND
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Zeke is Injured

Sparknotes.TITLE: A KNIGHT’S DUTY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A KNIGHT’S DUTY

Sparknotes.TITLE: A KNIGHT’S DUTY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale is unable to make the decision, but Rook can tell what he wants to tell him. It’s his time to make a sacrifice. He makes the decision for her, so that she doesn’t have to feel guilty about his life.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A KNIGHT’S DUTY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Suri appears to try and convince him to stop, furious with grief. But she can’t talk him out of it. Rook gives the pendant to Nightingale, asking Suri to take care of everyone when he’s gone.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A KNIGHT’S DUTY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Suri rages against the Shadow Lord for a moment, ineffectively, before vanishing.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A KNIGHT’S DUTY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Shadow Lord is appeased by the grief and pain they’ve felt, and kills Rook right in front of him. It accepts the payment, and offers them Justice.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A KNIGHT’S DUTY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: A New Owner

Sparknotes.TITLE: A KNIGHT’S DUTY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Rook has been killed

Sparknotes.TITLE: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (INDOOR)

Sparknotes.TITLE: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Damocles wakes surrounded by the broken wreckage of the coffin, lying aching on his back. The visions he saw in the coffin still torture him.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale is there to bring him back to reality, and explain what he missed.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Damocles explains to everyone that before the coffin was destroyed, he saw some of its memories. The bloody trail they saw earlier is the key to finding Justice.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Damocles is no longer Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (OUTDOOR)

Sparknotes.TITLE: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Damocles wakes outside in the sun, though the haunting vision of his dead mother is fresh in his mind.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale is there beside him, to help bring him back to reality and explain that the coffin was feeding on him, he wasn’t in the real world.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group does their best to catch him on what he missed, and explain how they got outside.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A MOTHER’S REMORSE (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Damocles is no longer Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: A POOR CHOICE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A POOR CHOICE

Sparknotes.TITLE: A POOR CHOICE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale refuses to trade anyone. She declines the offer and demands Justice back anyway.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A POOR CHOICE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Shadow Lord is disappointed its offer has been refused, but consoles itself that it will have all their souls now instead of one.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SERIOUS PROBLEM
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A SERIOUS PROBLEM

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SERIOUS PROBLEM
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Abigail and Tyrial greet Padric with excitement, obviously old friends. They don’t seem to care much about royal formality.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SERIOUS PROBLEM
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Things are tenser for Shayliss and Abigail, who are tense and awkward around each other.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SERIOUS PROBLEM
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss introduces Nightingale, and the two fawn over her for a moment.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SERIOUS PROBLEM
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Reluctant Partnership

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SHAKY PROPOSITION
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A SHAKY PROPOSITION

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SHAKY PROPOSITION
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice says that if they reassemble the Pontifex with all three pieces, she could use it to seal the Maluma into a new body. But she doesn’t know where they could actually find a willing host.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SHAKY PROPOSITION
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After some debate, it is decided that Shayliss, Zeke and Padric will be traveling to Arkalla to replace the Aegis stone.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SHAKY PROPOSITION
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale, Remi, Rook, Damocles, and Justice will go to the vaults to get the last piece of the pontifex.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SHAKY PROPOSITION
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Party Check: Is Zafir in the party?

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SHORT VICTORY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A SHORT VICTORY

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SHORT VICTORY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After a terrible fight, they’re finally able to defeat the Soul Butcher.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SHORT VICTORY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: They don’t stay for long, as the sound of more creatures echoes thorugh the halls. The Pixies return, guiding them to a hasty escape before more butchers arrive.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SOMBER REALIZATION
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A SOMBER REALIZATION

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SOMBER REALIZATION
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss stops the group after walking a long while, horrified by what she’s discovered. She rages that Justice is lost and there’s nothing they can do. Her map didn’t show it, but now that she’s here she recognizes the spot.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SOMBER REALIZATION
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss explains that Justice is trapped beyond the protection of the Aegis stone, an ancient and powerful protection put in place by Lo Jeong. It’s the only thing keeping Greyhaven safe from thousands of creatures that dwell in the Eerie.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SOMBER REALIZATION
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After discovering there’s no other way to open it without putting the city at risk, Nightingale suggests asking the city’s rulers, Tyrial and Abigail, about the Aegis stone. Maybe they’ll have a way to get them past it without putting Greyhaven at risk.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SOMBER REALIZATION
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zeke is upset to leave Justice behind, but after seeing how much the Maluma has worn Nightingale down, he reluctantly allows them to leave.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SOMBER REALIZATION
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Reluctant Partnership

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SON’S FAILURE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A SON’S FAILURE

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SON’S FAILURE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Damocles is forced to relive the night of his mother’s exposure to the Blight. He watches in lurid detail as his own failures lead to her exposure.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SON’S FAILURE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: She rots away before his eyes, forcing him to kill her and filling him with guilt over his failure to save her life.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A SON’S FAILURE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Coffin Buddy

Sparknotes.TITLE: A STUPID BOY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A STUPID BOY

Sparknotes.TITLE: A STUPID BOY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook wakes early into the morning to a jostling sound, and discovers Zeke has slipped away.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A STUPID BOY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: He wakes the others, informing them that Zeke has probably gone off to rescue justice. The group is sure he can’t get through the Aegis stone, but he could get himself hurt.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A STUPID BOY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group hastily packs their bags and hurries out after him.

Sparknotes.TITLE: A STUPID BOY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Zeke is Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: A STUPID BOY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Experienced Guide

Sparknotes.TITLE: ALL THAT MATTERS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ALL THAT MATTERS

Sparknotes.TITLE: ALL THAT MATTERS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale watches in horror as the Butcher decaipates Zafir before her eyes, butchering him in seconds. It turns on her, but before it can reach her Ezra and Brea arrive, fighting desperately to hold it back from Nightingale.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ALL THAT MATTERS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Ezra urges Nightingale and the group to flee, reminding them that the Pontifex is all that matters. They use this opportunity to escape as quickly as they can, making it some distance before they find an empty chamber to rest in.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ALL THAT MATTERS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group discusses Zafir’s sacrifice. Damocles is unmoved by their deaths, while Remi is furious at the fate they suffered.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ALL THAT MATTERS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale has a breakdown, believing that Damocles was right. All of Greyhaven was condemned because of her mercy. The city will die, the group will die, and it will be Nightingale’s fault.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ALL THAT MATTERS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zeke calms her down, though Nightingale remains grim.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ALL THAT MATTERS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: Butchered

Sparknotes.TITLE: ALL THAT MATTERS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Zafir was killed

Sparknotes.TITLE: AMATEURS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: AMATEURS

Sparknotes.TITLE: AMATEURS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group is unwilling to give up, so rather than fight past the overwhelming monsters, they run wildly through the forest, dodging through dense foliage until they’re able to find another way around.

Sparknotes.TITLE: AMATEURS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zeke reminds them that Justice is waiting, that there’s no time to rest and recover. They must fight on.

Sparknotes.TITLE: AMUSING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: AMUSING

Sparknotes.TITLE: AMUSING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Defeating the Shadow Lord is impossible, and it beats the party back with ease. Yet it hasn’t killed any of them yet, apparently intending to savor their deaths one by one.

Sparknotes.TITLE: AMUSING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Shadow Lord muses that it obviously needs to return to the surface, humans have grown complacent if they think they can fight powers greater than themselves.

Sparknotes.TITLE: AMUSING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Reluctant Partnership AND A Helping Hand

Sparknotes.TITLE: AND WHO IS THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: AND WHO IS THIS?

Sparknotes.TITLE: AND WHO IS THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Tyrial notices the Anointed lurking in the corner of the room. Zafir introduces their group, and explains the dark gods they fight. Abigail and Tyrial clearly think they’re completely insane.

Sparknotes.TITLE: AND WHO IS THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: When introductions are over, Nightingale explains their mission, and why they need to get into the Eerie.

Sparknotes.TITLE: AND WHO IS THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Tyrial insists this is impossible, explaining that the dragon-slaying mural on their wall depicts the way Lo and Ida obtained it in the first place. They had to travel the Middle Passage, make a pact with a demon, then enter Arkalla and kill a dragon within. It would be impossible to recreate their feat.

Sparknotes.TITLE: AND WHO IS THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: There is no way to open the way into the Eerie. They ask Zeke if Justice would want to sacrifice the lives of everyone in the city to save herself. He admits that she wouldn’t.

Sparknotes.TITLE: AND WHO IS THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir insists that it wouldn’t be Justice’s choice to make. Not getting her and the piece of the Pontifex back might mean the death for everyone in Elenia. Even sacrificing a city is a modest price to pay.

Sparknotes.TITLE: AND WHO IS THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Tyrial is outraged at the suggestion, and rejects the suggestion outright. Zafir stops arguing and submits quietly.

Sparknotes.TITLE: AND WHO IS THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Abigail tries to reassure Nightingale that they’ll feel better tomorrow, and might be able to figure out what to do then.

Sparknotes.TITLE: AND WHO IS THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Last of Her Cotorie

Sparknotes.TITLE: AND WHO IS THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Massacred

Sparknotes.TITLE: ANYTHING FOR OUR FRIENDS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ANYTHING FOR OUR FRIENDS

Sparknotes.TITLE: ANYTHING FOR OUR FRIENDS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zeke’s persuasions ultimately win out and they agree to help the coffin to the surface.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ANYTHING FOR OUR FRIENDS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group returns to inform it, and the coffin is grateful. It insists it knows the fastest way to the surface. The pixies drag it easily out the way they came.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ANYTHING FOR OUR FRIENDS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: Coffin Buddy

Sparknotes.TITLE: BACK OFF
Sparknotes.CONTENT: BACK OFF

Sparknotes.TITLE: BACK OFF
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After making it a little distance from the Eerie, Damocles attacks Echo, knocking her out in a single strike.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BACK OFF
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir and the Anointed turn, furious. Damocles is unrepentant, explaining that without the Shadow Lord around, the Soul Stitcher will return and make Echo violent again. Keeping her unconscious is the only way to keep her pacified.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BACK OFF
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir is unconvinced, and they nearly attack each other. Brea and Ezra hold him back, while Padric and Rook keep Damocles from fighting.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BACK OFF
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss tells them all to shut up and threatens everyone with imprisonment who tries to get violent. Getting back to Greyhaven is the only thing that matters now.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BACK TO THE SURFACE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: BACK TO THE SURFACE

Sparknotes.TITLE: BACK TO THE SURFACE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: With the Shadow Lord gone, the Eerie seems to be collapsing around them, or at least his lair is. It’s a strain on all of them to escape intact. Eventually they reach the surface, and clamber out of the Eerie and into the light.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BACK TO THE SURFACE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group collapses to rest, but Shayliss urges them onward. Greyhaven needs a warning, and they have to give it.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BACK TO THE SURFACE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: A Helping Hand

Sparknotes.TITLE: BACK TO THE SURFACE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Reluctant Partnership

Sparknotes.TITLE: BACK TO THE SURFACE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: A Greater Cause

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLACKHAND PROTÉGÉ
Sparknotes.CONTENT: BLACKHAND PROTÉGÉ

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLACKHAND PROTÉGÉ
Sparknotes.CONTENT: While trapped in the coffin, Remi sees a vision of her future. She’s become an assassin for the black hand, ruthless and powerful.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLACKHAND PROTÉGÉ
Sparknotes.CONTENT: She is on a mission to assassinate a powerful political target. But it’s personal for her. After killing everyone in her way, she reaches the bedroom of Princess Nightingale, last of the Arsen family. She’s been poisoned, but survives, forcing Remi to kill her herself.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLACKHAND PROTÉGÉ
Sparknotes.CONTENT: She tries to justify the murder to herself, but ultimately refuses to do it. Her real memories are too powerful to ignore.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLACKHAND PROTÉGÉ
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Coffin Buddy

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLOOD TRAILS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: BLOOD TRAILS

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLOOD TRAILS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group travels through the Eeriee, following the trails of blood deeper. The Maluma torments Nightingale, trying to get her to leave. She ignores it for some distance, until the creature manifests physically before everyone.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLOOD TRAILS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss reacts with instant violence, but the Maluma is only a projection, and nothing happens. It explains they’ve reached the lair of the Shadow Lord. If they go further and they’re killed, their souls will be his forever.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLOOD TRAILS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale mocks it, pointing out that the Maluma is only afraid because it too would be captured. They ignore it and continue on.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLOOD TRAILS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Maluma wasn’t lying, and soon they pass through a boundry into the Shadow Lord’s lair. The creature notices them instantly, manifesting as a faint projection. It admits that Justice is trapped in its lair, and they’ll never find her.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLOOD TRAILS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: When it’s finished mocking them the Shadow Lord vanishes, leaving them free to continue downward.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLOOD TRAILS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Reluctant Partnership

Sparknotes.TITLE: BLOOD TRAILS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Massacred

Sparknotes.TITLE: BRAWL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: BRAWL

Sparknotes.TITLE: BRAWL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss answers instantly that none of this is their fault, and brings out Echo. She explains what happened, that Echo was the one who destroyed the stone.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BRAWL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Tyrial appears, dragging Echo away to the dungeons. Damocles informs them of Echo’s dangerous Esper and her ability to come back to life.

Sparknotes.TITLE: BRAWL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir defends Echo, explaining that she was manipulated by the Esper, it wasn’t her decision. Tyrial doesn’t seem to care, and says that defending the city is all that matters. Her trial can wait.

Sparknotes.TITLE: CITY AT THE EDGE OF THE WORLD
Sparknotes.CONTENT: CITY AT THE EDGE OF THE WORLD

Sparknotes.TITLE: CITY AT THE EDGE OF THE WORLD
Sparknotes.CONTENT: For a moment the group is stunned by their first sight of Greyhaven, a massive city with a palace floating in the sky above. It’s almost as big as Elenia, and the skies around them are filled with traffic.

Sparknotes.TITLE: CITY AT THE EDGE OF THE WORLD
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Remi learns the palace is called the Amaranthine, a fortress used by Lo and Ida when the ruins of the city were still overflowing with monsters.

Sparknotes.TITLE: CITY AT THE EDGE OF THE WORLD
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Even so, all the beauty could come crashing down if the city’s Float Core were destroyed, since they use the same magic as the airships, just much larger.

Sparknotes.TITLE: CITY AT THE EDGE OF THE WORLD
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Remi wants to explore the city, but Shayliss informs her that they won’t have time. Saving Justice is desperately urgent, and they’ll have to make her their first priority if they want to get to her in time.

Sparknotes.TITLE: COSMIC PUPPETS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: COSMIC PUPPETS

Sparknotes.TITLE: COSMIC PUPPETS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir is forced to relive his years of happiness with Echo. They’re together again in safety, before Charon’s betrayal.

Sparknotes.TITLE: COSMIC PUPPETS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The vision shifts as Echo confronts him about being abandoned, insisting that she’s been alive all this time and he didn’t care enough to save her.

Sparknotes.TITLE: COSMIC PUPPETS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir vows to do anything to get her back, but he’s tortured by visions of how she’s been alive and dead over and over again as she’s used as a puppet to do Charon’s bidding.

Sparknotes.TITLE: COSMIC PUPPETS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Coffin Buddy

Sparknotes.TITLE: COWARDS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: COWARDS

Sparknotes.TITLE: COWARDS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group wants to abandon Echo to her fate.

Sparknotes.TITLE: COWARDS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale remembers her promise, and refuses to do so. She chides her friends, then charges into battle, forcing the others to follow.

Sparknotes.TITLE: CUT THE STRINGS (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: CUT THE STRINGS (INDOOR)

Sparknotes.TITLE: CUT THE STRINGS (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir wakes screaming, overwhelmed by what he saw. Beside him is the broken coffin, which the group has hacked apart to finally get him free. Shayliss holds him down until he finally realizes what happened.

Sparknotes.TITLE: CUT THE STRINGS (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group explains how they were able to defeat the coffin and its Espers.

Sparknotes.TITLE: CUT THE STRINGS (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir shares that before the coffin was destroyed, he saw into its mind. He clearly connected the rescue of justice to the bloody trail on the ground. They need to follow it right away to reach her.

Sparknotes.TITLE: CUT THE STRINGS (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Zafir is no longer Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: CUT THE STRINGS (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: CUT THE STRINGS (OUTDOOR)

Sparknotes.TITLE: CUT THE STRINGS (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir wakes screaming, overwhelmed by what he saw. Shayliss holds him down until he finally realizes what happened.

Sparknotes.TITLE: CUT THE STRINGS (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group explains how he was captured, and how they found their way outside.

Sparknotes.TITLE: CUT THE STRINGS (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Zafir is no longer Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: DAMAGE CONTROL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: DAMAGE CONTROL

Sparknotes.TITLE: DAMAGE CONTROL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir is eager to accept the monster’s help. It’s going to escape anyway, and saving justice is their first priority.

Sparknotes.TITLE: DAMAGE CONTROL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Brea the Anointed explains that the coffin is the receptacle for a soul, keeping the one inside safe from the Shadow Lord.

Sparknotes.TITLE: DAMAGE CONTROL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Damocles agrees with Zafir, trying to persuade Nightingale and Shayliss to take the creature’s help.

Sparknotes.TITLE: DEAD NOW
Sparknotes.CONTENT: DEAD NOW

Sparknotes.TITLE: DEAD NOW
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss explains that they weren’t the ones to destroy the Aegis stone, they went in to try and stop it.

Sparknotes.TITLE: DEAD NOW
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Abigail wants to know who it was, but Shayliss has to tell them that they’re already dead. Abigail is unhappy, apparently uninterested in revenge. All that matters is saving the city.

Sparknotes.TITLE: DESCENT INTO THE EERIE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: DESCENT INTO THE EERIE

Sparknotes.TITLE: DESCENT INTO THE EERIE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Remi ends up at the front as they climb down into the Eerie, taking in the ancient, long-untouched geography of the place.

Sparknotes.TITLE: DESCENT INTO THE EERIE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Soon enough they’re past the reach of sunlight, in a maze of twisting passages. Now they have to navigate.

Sparknotes.TITLE: DESCENT INTO THE EERIE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Reward Check: Chalice of Manala

Sparknotes.TITLE: EFFICIENT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: EFFICIENT

Sparknotes.TITLE: EFFICIENT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss explains that they weren’t the ones to destroy the Aegis stone, they went in to try and stop it.

Sparknotes.TITLE: EFFICIENT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Abigail wants to know who it was, and Shayliss explains that it was Zafir, and that he died for it. His death won’t help Greyhaven now.

Sparknotes.TITLE: EFFICIENT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Tyrial urges them to return to planning the defense.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ENDING 5: SCREAMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ENDING 5: SCREAMING

Sparknotes.TITLE: ENDING 5: SCREAMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Coffin’s terrible power is beyond anything they can resist. It shows no mercy, slaughtering the group one at a time.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ENDING 5: SCREAMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zeke is the last one left alive, watching as it finally advances on him.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ENDING 5: SCREAMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: As he dies, his soul is pulled downward, to join the others trapped in torment. At least he finally finds Justice.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ENDING 5: SCREAMING
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Game Over

Sparknotes.TITLE: ENDING 6: HORRIFIC CREATURES
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ENDING 6: HORRIFIC CREATURES

Sparknotes.TITLE: ENDING 6: HORRIFIC CREATURES
Sparknotes.CONTENT: No one would ever know what happened to Elenia’s princesses or their brave companions. In the end, stories would be told (incorrectly) of how they’d learned of the destroyed Aegis stone and gone down to hold off the hoards of monsters and protect Greyhaven.

Sparknotes.TITLE: ENDING 6: HORRIFIC CREATURES
Sparknotes.CONTENT: They failed here too, but at least their noble sacrifice would be remembered.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GAME OVER
Sparknotes.CONTENT: GAME OVER

Sparknotes.TITLE: EVICTED (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: EVICTED (INDOOR)

Sparknotes.TITLE: EVICTED (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale wakes in the cavern, mind still spinning from her vision. She’s left firmly remembering one thing above all others: the Maluma’s chief drive isn’t loyalty to Charon, it’s just staying on Middara.

Sparknotes.TITLE: EVICTED (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The coffin has been beaten to wreckage beside her, the fight finally won.

Sparknotes.TITLE: EVICTED (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Her friends help her to her feet, discovering that Nightingale is relatively unharmed from her experience. They get her back up to speed on what happened, and how they ended up outside.

Sparknotes.TITLE: EVICTED (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale explains that she briefly saw the memories of the coffin before it was destroyed. She’s sure the bloody trail is the key to finding Justice.

Sparknotes.TITLE: EVICTED (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Nightingale is no longer Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: EVICTED (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: EVICTED (OUTDOOR)

Sparknotes.TITLE: EVICTED (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale wakes with the sun, mind still spinning from her vision. She’s left firmly remembering one thing above all others: the Maluma’s chief drive isn’t loyalty to Charon, it’s just staying on Middara.

Sparknotes.TITLE: EVICTED (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Her friends help her to her feet, discovering that Nightingale is relatively unharmed from her experience. They get her back up to speed on what happened, and how they ended up outside.

Sparknotes.TITLE: EVICTED (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Nightingale is no longer Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: FARMER’S BLIGHT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: FARMER’S BLIGHT

Sparknotes.TITLE: FARMER’S BLIGHT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook’s vision while trapped inside the coffin is of his life on the farm. He’s returned to live with his parents, and they’re not alone. Suri is living with him, his wife after their time adventuring together.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FARMER’S BLIGHT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: His peaceful vision is interrupted as they’re attacked by the Great Bounty. They’ve been tracked down at last.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FARMER’S BLIGHT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook tries to fight, but he’s forced to watch as his family is slaughtered. He tries in vain to free her, but he’s too weak, and Suri is taken back to Arkalla.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FARMER’S BLIGHT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Coffin Buddy

Sparknotes.TITLE: FINDING ANOTHER WAY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: FINDING ANOTHER WAY

Sparknotes.TITLE: FINDING ANOTHER WAY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Despite Zeke’s insistence, in the end the group refuses to assist the coffin. They hope to just leave it behind, and pray it gets lost on its way to the surface.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FINDING ANOTHER WAY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The pixies react with fury to this news. Rather than taking the coffin and leaving, they instantly turn hostile, blocking off the exit.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FINDING ANOTHER WAY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Terrible power reaches out from within the coffin, grabbing the nearest member of the group and dragging them in.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FINDING ANOTHER WAY
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: An Uninjured Adventurer is Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: FINISH: HEART OF A DRAGON
Sparknotes.CONTENT: FINISH: HEART OF A DRAGON

Sparknotes.TITLE: FINISH: HEART OF A DRAGON
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale and Shayliss discuss their upcoming missions. Nightingale explains that the Maluma is keeping its word so far. She wants to know if Shayliss thinks they can really save Greyhaven.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FINISH: HEART OF A DRAGON
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss says she’s heard the stories, and knows it’s possible. She promises that after they make it out of all this, Nightingale will be in the Demiurge for sure.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FINISH: HEART OF A DRAGON
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale admits she hasn’t even thought about it in ages, though she does worry about Kufu. Now that she’s survived so much, she thinks the demiurge will probably be simple for her.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FIXING THIS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: FIXING THIS

Sparknotes.TITLE: FIXING THIS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group returns to the throne room to discuss the battle for Greyhaven. It’s already going badly. These aren’t mindless monsters rampaging, they’ve been plotting their revenge for years. An evacuation is underway, but many will not be able to escape.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FIXING THIS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: There is only one way to save the city: reseal the Eerie with a new Aegis stone. They discuss the method used last time: a contract made with a demon, then the trip to Arkalla, and finally killing a dragon.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FIXING THIS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: During this impossible task, Greyhaven will be under siege. If the attackers reach the float core, the palace will fall and the city will be destroyed.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FIXING THIS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Tyrial will fly to Castikoff for reinforcements while Abigail defends the city and protects the float core.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FIXING THIS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Soul Judgement

Sparknotes.TITLE: FIXING THIS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Last of her Coterie

Sparknotes.TITLE: FLYING WITHOUT WINGS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: FLYING WITHOUT WINGS

Sparknotes.TITLE: FLYING WITHOUT WINGS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook discovers Ursy has climbed all the way up to the Crow’s nest, where she’s enjoying their flight with no regard for the dangers. After enjoying her perch for a few moments more, she agrees to join Rook back on the deck.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FLYING WITHOUT WINGS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook chides her for her dangerous choice, explaining that the Oppressor is taking the fastest but most dangerous route to Greyhaven, and that she needs to be somewhere safe in case they’re attacked.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FORGIVE THE GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: FORGIVE THE GIRL

Sparknotes.TITLE: FORGIVE THE GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Shadow Lord is far more powerful than it initially seems. Though they all fight together, it’s just too powerful. Soon they’re completely overwhelmed, and they’re about to die one at a time.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FORGIVE THE GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir calls out before that can happen, attracting the demigod’s attention. He asks the Shadow Lord to forgive Nightingale, that the attack was against his will, and they would like to ask for the initial offer. He will give up his life so the rest of them can leave.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FORGIVE THE GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale tries to talk him out of making the choice, but he has made up his mind. The Shadow Lord kills him in front of everyone, giving them Justice in exchange.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FORGIVE THE GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: A Greater Cause

Sparknotes.TITLE: FORGIVE THE GIRL
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Zafir has died

Sparknotes.TITLE: FRESH AIR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: FRESH AIR

Sparknotes.TITLE: FRESH AIR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Coffin leads them the rest of the way to the surface, forcing them to follow all the way during the long hike up the canyon.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FRESH AIR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Eventually they reach the surface. The Coffin is eager to be out, and at least it keeps its word. It explains that the way to find Justice is to follow the blood trails into the Shadow Lord’s lair.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FRESH AIR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss doesn’t want to let the monster leave, but they’re running out of time. They can’t afford to waste time fighting it now.

Sparknotes.TITLE: FRESH AIR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Flag: Time is of the Essence

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HER!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: GET OFF OF HER!

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HER!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: All of them working together are finally able to kill the Butcher. Echo remains wounded, and the Stitcher is nowhere to be seen. Apparently it can’t reach here to repair her injuries.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HER!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Damocles attacks her immediately, determined to kill her at last. Rook and Padric pull him off. Shayliss explains that all of Greyhaven have a right to justice from her as well, and that he’ll have to bide his time. They need all the help they can get to escape from the Shadow Lord alive.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HER!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Echo agrees, explaining that she couldn’t possibly fight to the Shadow Lord on her own.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HER!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: They confiscate Echo’s weapons for the time being, after protest.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HER!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale explains why they’re sparing her: she made a promise to Zafir and she intends to keep it.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HER!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: A Helping Hand

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HIM!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: GET OFF OF HIM!

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HIM!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: All of them working together are finally able to slay the Butcher.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HIM!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Anointed use this moment of calm to treat Zafir’s wounds, giving him the last of their powerful potions to get him back on his feet.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HIM!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss seems willing to confront them right there, until the anointed point out how desperately bad their odds of survival are on their own.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HIM!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The rest of the group agrees, suggesting that Zafir can stand trial for destroying the Aegis stone after they escape.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HIM!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Shadow Lord appears, hoping they’ll kill each other, but they refuse. It leaves them alone, confident they will find their deaths another way.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HIM!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: All We Can Get

Sparknotes.TITLE: GET OFF OF HIM!
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Zafir is no longer Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: GIVE ME A CHANCE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: GIVE ME A CHANCE

Sparknotes.TITLE: GIVE ME A CHANCE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss points out that they still have to figure out what to do with Zafir. She believes he should be imprisoned for his actions, that he’s far too dangerous and he’s guilty of violence against the princess.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GIVE ME A CHANCE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir counters that Nightingale is dying and that his help is too important. He knows Charon and its servants better than anyone.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GIVE ME A CHANCE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Maluma wants Nightingale to get rid of him.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GIVE ME A CHANCE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: The party must decide to Lock the Anointed Up, or Let them Help

Sparknotes.TITLE: GIVE US AN HOUR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: GIVE US AN HOUR

Sparknotes.TITLE: GIVE US AN HOUR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir informs everyone that him and the other Anointed can bring the barrier down with an hour of ritual magic. They’re ready to start right away.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GIVE US AN HOUR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss responds in range, explaining the importance of the Aegis stone and the creatures that will be released to devour Greyhaven as soon as the stone is destroyed.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GIVE US AN HOUR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir doesn’t care if the city dies, since he believes that the world may perish if no one retrieves the Pontifex. He’s willing to sacrifice anything to cross.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GIVE US AN HOUR
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale demands that he stop, and reluctantly he agrees to come back with them to the Amaranthine.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GRABBING OUR THINGS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: GRABBING OUR THINGS

Sparknotes.TITLE: GRABBING OUR THINGS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Pixies warn the group not to touch anything, that the room is trapped for those who might find it, but not for them.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GRABBING OUR THINGS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: They fly towards the huge coffin at the center, lifting it by its chains and dragging it out of the gold with surprising strength. The illusion of wealth vanishes, leaving them alone with the coffin. They say that the rescue is complete and now they can leave.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GRABBING OUR THINGS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zeke wants to know how they’re saving their master if they’re already dead, before a voice echoes from within the coffin. A strange voice echoes from inside. At first it seems hostile, before the Pixies informs it that the group isn’t food, and that they’re on an important quest.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GRABBING OUR THINGS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zeke says that in exchange for freeing them, he wants to know how to find Justice. The coffin promises that in exchange for their help escaping the lair, it will tell them how to find her.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GRABBING OUR THINGS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group confers in private to discuss their options.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GRABBING OUR THINGS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Reluctant Partnership

Sparknotes.TITLE: GRABBING OUR THINGS
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Massacred

Sparknotes.TITLE: GREYHAVEN REVISITED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: GREYHAVEN REVISITED

Sparknotes.TITLE: GREYHAVEN REVISITED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: As they close in on Greyhaven, it’s clear that they’ve come too late. A wide trail of death leads straight to the city.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GREYHAVEN REVISITED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: When they finally arrive, their worst fears are confirmed. Fires burn as little battles rage all over. The sound of screaming citizens mingles with the roars of the monsters devouring them.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GREYHAVEN REVISITED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale wants to help the citizens, but Shayliss stops her, reminding Nightingale that the group has been beaten to a pulp and doesn’t have the strength right now. They need to reach the Amaranthine and help organize the defense from there.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GREYHAVEN REVISITED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: A gigantic wurm emerges from the ground in front of them, smelling their blood. But before they can be devoured, a familiar airship arrives. Effie bombards the creature, sending it back underground and lowering a ladder for them. They climb aboard, ordering her to take them to the palace.

Sparknotes.TITLE: GREYHAVEN REVISITED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group asks that she stay close, that they might need her ship later. She pilots them down to the battlements and lets them off. Abigail is waiting there to confront them as soon as they disembark. She demands to know why they would’ve destroyed the

Sparknotes.TITLE: GREYHAVEN REVISITED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Helping Hand

Sparknotes.TITLE: GREYHAVEN REVISITED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Flag Check: Massacred

Sparknotes.TITLE: GREYHAVEN REVISITED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Party Check: Is Zafir in the party?

Sparknotes.TITLE: HARSH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: HARSH

Sparknotes.TITLE: HARSH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: As soon as they make it a little distance from the Eerie, Nightingale hears a sharp crack, and turns around to discover that Damocles has struck Echo from behind, knocking her out cold.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HARSH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss is furious, and orders Damocles to carry her the rest of the way.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: HAUNTED

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zeke hurries over to revive Justice, who eventually wakes. She wants to know how they got there. Zeke explains they had to trade someone’s life to get her back.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice is furious with them, horrified at what they’ve done. She insists they take it back, but of course it’s too late.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale explains that it was her choice to make the trade, despite everything.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Shadow Lord wishes Justice a surprisingly polite farewell. She doesn’t seem wounded, but her eyes are haunted and horrified whenever she looks at it.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTED
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zeke comforts her, ineffectively.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTING WORDS (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: HAUNTING WORDS (INDOOR)

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTING WORDS (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss wakes on the floor beside the broken coffin, shaking off the memories of what she’s seen. Nightingale is there to greet her and help comfort her. Shayliss knows clearly what happened, and doesn’t need much of an explanation.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTING WORDS (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group catches her up on what happened while she was trapped, and the battle they had.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTING WORDS (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss explains that before the creature was destroyed, she observed some of its memories. The bloody trail they saw earlier is the key to finding Justice.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTING WORDS (INDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Shayliss is no longer Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTING WORDS (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: HAUNTING WORDS (OUTDOOR)

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTING WORDS (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss wakes outside, shaking off the memories of what she’s seen. Nightingale is there to greet her and help comfort her. Shayliss knows clearly what happened, and doesn’t need much of an explanation.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTING WORDS (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group catches her up on what happened while she was trapped, and how they got outside.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HAUNTING WORDS (OUTDOOR)
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Shayliss is no longer Unselectable

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE HAD HIS CHANCE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: HE HAD HIS CHANCE

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE HAD HIS CHANCE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After some deliberation, Nightingale decides that Zafir can’t be trusted.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE HAD HIS CHANCE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Tyrial orders the Anointed to be imprisoned. They’re too dangerous to have around.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE HAD HIS CHANCE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: Imprisoned Anointed

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE HAD HIS CHANCE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Zafir has been imprisoned

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE’LL BE FINE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: HE’LL BE FINE

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE’LL BE FINE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The group decides that the Shadow Lord is probably lying, and even if he isn’t who cares about Zafir? They decide not to go and save him.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE’LL BE FINE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: The Shadow Lord laughs, vanishing from before them.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE’LL BE FINE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Damocles insists that they’re still on the right path, and they should be ignoring everything the Shadow Lord does.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE’LL BE FINE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! New Story Flag: Capable Enough

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE’LL BE FINE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Special: Zafir leaves the party.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE’S AN ASSET
Sparknotes.CONTENT: HE’S AN ASSET

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE’S AN ASSET
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Nightingale is nervous to admit it, but Zafir is just too important to sacrifice. Despite the others disbelief, she refuses to budge.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HE’S AN ASSET
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Zafir agrees to travel with Nightingale to find the Pontifex, then to leave her alone forever.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HERE’S THE SPLIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: HERE’S THE SPLIT

Sparknotes.TITLE: HERE’S THE SPLIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Justice says that if they reassemble the Pontifex with all three pieces, she could use it to seal the Maluma into a new body. But she doesn’t know where they could actually find a willing host.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HERE’S THE SPLIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After some discussion, the group decides to send Shayliss, Zeke, and Padric to Arkalla while Justice, Nightingale, Damocles, and Remi travel to find the last piece of the pontifex.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HERE’S THE SPLIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Tyrial wants to know where the knight will be going, and Nightingale explains that he’s dead.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HERE’S THE SPLIT
Sparknotes.CONTENT: ! Party Check: Is Zafir in the party?

Sparknotes.TITLE: HOW DO WE HANDLE THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: HOW DO WE HANDLE THIS?

Sparknotes.TITLE: HOW DO WE HANDLE THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Shayliss explains that they weren’t the one to break the Aegis stone, and they bring up the unconscious body of Echo. She explains that she was the one who broke the stone, and they caught her.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HOW DO WE HANDLE THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Damocles warns them of her powers, and the Esper that heals her.

Sparknotes.TITLE: HOW DO WE HANDLE THIS?
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Tyrial calls for the guards, and they carry her off to a secure cell of the dungeons.

Sparknotes.TITLE: I’M SAFE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: I’M SAFE

Sparknotes.TITLE: I’M SAFE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: Rook uses his pendant, calling on Suri’s help.

Sparknotes.TITLE: I’M SAFE
Sparknotes.CONTENT: She appears, gleeful and excited to see him again. After a brief conversation, she flies off, creating a trail for them to follow to safety.

Sparknotes.TITLE: INTO THE EARTH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: INTO THE EARTH

Sparknotes.TITLE: INTO THE EARTH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: After they reach a mountainous cliffside, Shayliss stops the group to lecture them about the danger they’re about to be in.

Sparknotes.TITLE: INTO THE EARTH
Sparknotes.CONTENT: She explains that the Shadow Lord isn’t like any monster they’ve fought before. It’s a God of death, literally immortal. It can harvest the souls of the ones that die in its domain.

Sparknotes.TITLE: INTO THE EARTH
